CHAT.comment: Hesitation phenomena have not been accurately transcribed in this data.

u.a: INV , MOT and CHI are in room . CHI is the only one in full camera view . CHI picks up toy football . INV explains warm-up task to MOT and then leaves the room
Ema is a Hebrew form of Mommy and is used in the tape along with some Yiddish words , such as keppie , for head .
CHI holds up the football and looks towards the camera
MOT sits in chair near door
CHI throws the football on the floor
CHI looks down at the football on the floor
CHI bends down under the table to pick up the ball
CHI is off screen under the table
CHI holds the ball up in the air
CHI holds the football up and looks at MOT
CHI throws the football to MOT
MOT catches the football and rolls it back to CHI
CHI crawls over and picks up the toy duck
CHI sits and examines the duck
CHI turns and holds duck out to MOT
CHI turns and looks up at MOT
CHI puts the duck into his mouth
MOT squeezes the duck and moves it around CHI
MOT makes noises like a duck
MOT moves duck towards CHI and finally pokes him in the stomach playfully with the duck
MOT makes noises like a duck
MOT moves duck towards CHI and finally pokes him in the nose playfully with the duck
MOT makes noises like a duck
MOT moves duck towards CHI and finally pokes him in the nose playfully with the duck
CHI watches MOT . CHI looks down at his lap after MOT touches his nose
MOT puts the duck on the floor
CHI picks the duck up and squeezes it
MOT looks at CHI as she shakes her head once and then smiles
CHI throws the duck and it bounces off of the floor
MOT nods her head in conjunction with the motion of the duck
CHI picks up the duck and squeezes it . <aft> CHI throws the duck behind him
<bef> MOT looks at the duck on the floor . MOT looks at CHI
CHI turns around to see the duck and then rolls the car over
CHI picks the car up and starts to hand it to MOT then throws it across the floor
CHI leans over and picks up the toy duck
CHI gives the duck to MOT
MOT takes the duck from CHI and squeezes it
CHI turns and looks around the room then looks at MOT
CHI crawls over to the jack+in+the+box
CHI pulls the jack+in+the+box in front of him
MOT picks the jack+in+the+box up and puts it between them
MOT winds the handle of the jack+in+the+box
MOT leans back and watches CHI
MOT helps CHI turn the handle
CHI tries to turn the handle and then lets go of it
<bef> CHI lets go of the handle
CHI watches MOT the looks down at the jack+in+the+box
CHI looks up at MOT and smiles then looks down at the jack+in+the+box
CHI looks up at MOT and then at the jack+in+the+box
MOT winds the jack+in+the+box until song finishes
MOT pushes the clown down into the jack+in+the+box
CHI extends his arm towards the jack+in+the+box
CHI watches jack+in+the+box and extends his arm towards it
MOT tries to close the lid
CHI stares at the jack+in+the+box still extending his arm
MOT pushes the clown into the jack+in+the+box
MOT closes the lid and winds the jack+in+the+box
MOT helps CHI wind the jack+in+the+box
<bef> CHI stops trying to turn the handle and touches the lid
CHI looks up at MOT in frustration then at the jack+in+the+box
CHI tries to open the lid
MOT continues to turn the handle
CHI tries to open the lid
CHI sits back and removes his hand
MOT turns the handle the rest of the way
CHI pushes the clown back in the jack+in+the+box
CHI touches the top of the jack+in+the+box then the handle and then the top again
CHI holds the clown as it comes out of the jack+in+the+box
MOT turns the handle a few more times
CHI pushes the clown back into the box
MOT closes the lid of the jack+in+the+box
CHI pulls his hand back and looks at the jack+in+the+box

MOT points to the handle while holding the top down with her other hand
CHI tries to turn the handle but cannot
MOT pulls CHI's hand on the handle towards her
CHI touches the lid of the jack+in+the+box
MOT pulls CHI's hand off the top of the jack+in+the+box and puts it back on the handle and helps him turn it
CHI holds onto the handle as he looks down at his hand
MOT winds the jack+in+the+box with CHI
<bef> CHI lets go of the handle and tries to open the top of the jack+in+the+box
CHI looks up MOT in frustration

CHI looks down at the jack+in+the+box
<aft> MOT turns the handle once more
MOT sits back and looks at CHI

CHI tries to push the clown in twice

CHI pushes the clown down again

the ball hits CHI's sneakers and rolls away from CHI
